entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Added --with-irssi-lib option to specify where irssi-config is located. --with-irssi directory is used for include files.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: use only mod2+mod4 (alt + hyper), so num/scroll lock state doesn't affect keyboard bindings.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: More fixes with handling dead key presses. Automatic completions should work with space key again.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: setup dialog changes, and active window title is now colored. There's the setup dialog for changing the color, but it doesn't actually work yet..

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: destroy popup menus after they're closed.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: nicklist popup menu is now triggered on mouse press. the nicks are looked when the menuitem is executed, so if any of the originally selected nicks part the channel it won't be affected.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: notebooks are now scrollable so they won't limit the minimum width of window.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Highlighting works + other cleanups and fixes.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Ignores work now + many other smaller misc. fixes.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: "window item name changed" wasn't handled properly.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: implemented showing/hiding menubar/statusbar/nicklist - now if only the menubar shows their actual value correctly..

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: added completions, channels, setup icons and changed some stuff.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: alias list is now fully working.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Added setup dialog, generated with glade. It's hardly working, but you should see what it's supposed to look like now.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: when destroying last tab in frame, destroy the tab too.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: added server dialog, and gui.[ch] for some helper functions.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: yet another rewrite of nicklist rendering.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: default tab position is now at bottom.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: when detaching tab, the origin frame's tabs weren't renumbered.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: forgot to add gui-url.*, using grey background instead of lock icon now for topic locking, few minor changes.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Setup code with partially working server settings. Updated menu code. Added menubar (will be optional later).

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: moved the "x ops, y total" label inside nicklist.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: fix for clearing activity in split windows

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Show focus icon in active window

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: added bind actions left_window, right_window, upper_window and lower_window

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: tab numbers weren't updated when tab was closed.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: show tab number + all window items in tab.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: changing window name didn't update tab's label.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: don't show itemlist if there's only one window item in tab.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: added itemlist + some other minor fixes.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: don't set autocreated windows active automatically.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: tab label wasn't updated correctly when extractng pane into tab.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: call /quit before last window is destroyed, so it can print the quit messages while there's still windows.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: make clean shouldn't delete non-generated pixmaps :)

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Rewriting stuff. Irssi's structs are more tied to gtk widgets, and removed refcounting from irssi's side. All this to get code working better with reparenting widgets (== window d&d, which works excellently now :)

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: moving tabs between windows works now.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: drag'n'drop moving tabs works now. still needs to be able to drop tabs into existing windows..

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Added drag and drop moving/detaching of tabs, or at least the dragging but dropping doesn't really work yet :) Also removed the deprecated GTK calls.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: gtk-2.0.m4 isn't required anymore to be in system.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: mode changes messed up ops-counter above nicklist.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: /exec -quiet galeon so it stops complaining about using existing process :)

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: Moved printing with one big tag into multiple smaller tags, finally figured out that this is the correct way it should have been done from beginning :) Also added proper indenting to lines

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: doubleclicking nick did /query, but with invalid nick name

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: window size fixes, locale -> utf8 converting for topics and nick infos.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: added "make clean" and fixed the src/pixmaps dir order

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: changed nicklist pixmaps to 3d-like balls :) pixmaps by ccr.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: focus was automoved too late to entry line and it lost the keypress that brought it there.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: fix up/down/tab keys to work again properly

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: support for mod2..mod5, and fixed deadkeys

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: moved keyboard handling to gui-keyboard.c. added the rest of the bind actions.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: utf8 <-> locale conversion by default, popup menu fixes

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: popup menu / context stuff fixes. nick popup works.

entry.author: Timo Sirainen <tss@iki.fi>
entry.msg: support for monospace fonts, fixes for showing nick info in statusbar
